attributes.action: Start calling himself gordon brown, until he is elected to the position of Prime Minister!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that, should a person wish to be in the role of speaker for the people, he should be elected as such. Due to the fact that an election is long past and that the last elected prime minister was Tony Blair, Gordon Brown should stand down as "Prime Minister" untill elected and make a formal apology for assuming he undertood the peoples needs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
